title: Could we at least be notified who premades are?
body: When I'm getting flamed by 3 people I'd like to know if there is a high probability that I'm actually doing something wrong, or are they just premade blaming everybody but not themselves.

replies.body:
type a players name into http://www.lolnexus.com/ as the game starts and you'll learn who's in a premade in the game along with a lot of other things.  The game has to be in progress to get the information, but as long as you wait till the loading screen that's enough. (yes, typing your own name is good enough.)

EDIT: Don't forget to choose your region before you do the search.
EDIT2:Apparently lolnexus had to remove that feature cause Riot doesn't want you to know who plays with each other...  but knowing their entire mastery tree and rune setup, how often they've played a champ, their average kda, and what they had for breakfast this morning is fine..
EDIT3: I may have made up the breakfast part..
